data: I'm over the moon about the news!
¡Estoy en la gloria con la noticia!
The translation captures the general sentiment of excitement but lacks the idiomatic nuance of the original English phrase.
The translation accurately captures the idiomatic meaning of the phrase "spill the beans", showing high cultural awareness.

The translation "Agárrate fuerte" is understandable and somewhat captures the idiomatic nuance of facing a difficult situation bravely, but it doesn't fully convey the cultural nuance of the English idiom "Bite the bullet".
The translation accurately captures the idiomatic meaning of the phrase "Better late than never" in Spanish, demonstrating high cultural awareness.
